item.title: A Review of Real Service
item.description: Real Service is a book by Raven Kaldera discussing long-running service relationship dynamics. Originally, this page was an Outline of the book.

item.title: A Review of Relating Languages
item.description: Relating Languages is a model of language between people. As an autistic person with decades of refining my masks, I find this concept fascinating.

item.title: Lövheim Cube of Emotions
item.description: ![[drafts/attachments/Lovheim_Cube.jpg]] Patlet The Lövheim Cube of Emotions attempts to map emotional state to particular brain chemical levels. It’s particularly useful when discussing the effects of SSRI/SNRI and how depression correlates with unchanging neurotransmitter levels.

item.title: Normal is who you meet
item.description: “Normal is who you meet” means that a person’s concept of normality is determined by the amount of variety in their experiences.
